timeline.bodyText: allOf is not needed when the type does not inherit from another type
timeline.author: martin-kuba
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -202,6 +202,27 @@ components:
       discriminator:
         propertyName: beanName
 
+    ActionType:
+      type: string
+      description: "Action types for attributes."
+      enum:
+        - "WRITE"
+        - "WRITE_VO"
+        - "WRITE_PUBLIC"
+        - "READ"
+        - "READ_VO"
+        - "READ_PUBLIC"
+
+    AttributeRights:
+      allOf:

timeline.bodyText:
The javadoc also contains the following, please add it too:
Combination of entities is based on provided parameters, which are optional (at least one must be present).
timeline.author: martin-kuba
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2892,7 +2994,28 @@ paths:
         default:
           $ref: '#/components/responses/ExceptionResponse'
 
-#TODO getAttributesDefinitionWithRights
+  /urlinjsonout/attributesManager/getAttributesDefinitionWithRights:
+    get:
+      tags:
+        - AttributesManager
+      operationId: getAttributesDefinitionWithRights
+      summary: Returns all AttributeDefinitions for every entity and possible
+        combination of entities with rights. Only attribute definition of 
+        attributes user can read (or write) you will get.

timeline.message:
OpenApi - attributesManager methods

* Added new descriptions of methods to the openApi.
* Created new schemas for optional id parameters.

* getAttributeDefinitionWithRights
* removeAttribute
* updateAttributeDefinition
* getAttributeRights
* setAttributeRights

* Added new descriptions of methods to the openApi.
* Created new schemas for optional id parameters.
